sect1.title: Updating Packages with &gnome; Software
sect1.para: In addition to &gnome; Package Updater, &gnome; provides &gnome; Software for installation and update of applications via PackageKit. In order to work properly, &gnome; Software needs metadata from the AppStream project. &gnome; software supports installation and update of flatpaks and &gnome; shell extensions. It also offers updates for your hardware devices, if available.

While the &gnome; Package Updater updates packages within the running system (forcing you to restart the respective applications), &gnome; Software downloads the updates but only applies them at the next restart of the system.
